name: Mednet Healthcare Technologies
overview:
Mednet Healthcare Technologies, Inc. provides remote cardiac monitoring solutions and surveillance services. It offers ambulatory cardiac monitors and supporting systems; arrhythmia monitors that include mobile cardiac telemetry and cardiac event recorders; Heartrak ECAT, a wireless external cardiac ambulatory telemetry; and Heartrak Smart AF, an auto-trigger loop memory cardiac event recorder. The company also provides Heartrak Smart, a loop memory cardiac event recorder; Heartrak, a post-symptomatic cardiac event recorder; Mednet Access, a Internet based patient-link network; eCardiostation, a software that enables healthcare providers link to patient’s data; pacemaker transmitters; ECG receivers; cardiac event monitoring; and holter monitoring services. It offers products directly to physicians’ offices, hospitals, and independent diagnostic testing facilities.

The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Ewing, New Jersey.
